@Mashi, no it's 2.4x is the speed you need to have it written as otherwise the game won't work properly. and i'm downloading this game right now. and its already halfway finished. maybe if you guys learned how to do shit right then you wouldn't be having these problems. keep up the good work, morck22.

it is not vital that you burn at 2.4 exactly, i personaly burn them at x8 with no problems and the still work perfectly. but the slower the bur is done the less chance of errors, it also depends on how good your pc is eg a dual core pc with 2 gig of ram and not to much running in the background should find no problems at all ware as an older pc say single core 3 ghz 512 ram would find difficulty doing it at faster speeds
